projects.name: Foptimum
projects.description: Foptimum is a lightweight, dockerized app to monitor your internet speed and uptime so you can keep your ISP accountable. Foptimum exports its data to Prometheus so it can easily be visualized with a tool like Grafana. Currently has 3200+ pulls from Dockerhub and is listed on the unRAID app store.
projects.alt: Example metrics generated by Foptimum and displayed in Grafana.

projects.name: Minecraft Mod Manager
projects.description: Inspired by package managers like apt, npm and pip, Minecraft Mod Manager is a tool to download, update, and manage mods for your Minecraft server using the Modrinth and CursgeForge APIs.
projects.alt: Console log of a sample use of the program.

projects.name: This Website!
projects.description: Learn more about how this website was built and see how it was developed over time. Feedback on the website would be greatly appreciated and can be added as a new discussion. Created with React, React-Router, Javascript, TailwindCSS and DaisyUI.
projects.alt: Screenshot of this websites home page.
